content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Sanitize attachments action available for PDF files July 21, 2025—Cloud Email Gateway Protection enhances the "Sanitize attachments" action in Content Filtering policy to remove active content from PDF files, in addition to the previously supported Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint attachments. Email and Collaboration Security → Cloud Email Gateway Protection © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Sanitize attachments action available for PDF files
